Class Sorcerer

java.lang.Object
Sorcerer
public class Sorcerer extends Object
Class representing a warlock with three attributes: life, hasSoul, and power. This class will be used for a fighting video game. Uploaded to the repository:
Version:
1.0 *
Author:
Daniel Rodriguez

  • Method Details

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Method that returns whether the sorcerer is dead or not based on their life and whether they have a soul.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the warlock's life is less than or equal to zero. Returns true if the warlock has life but no soul. Returns false for other cases.

    • setPower

      public void setPower(int power)
      Method that sets the sorcerer's power. Negatives are not allowed; if the attempted power is negative, the power will be set to 0.
      Parameters:
      Power - represents the power that is being set.
